As a TOP PERFORMING school on our AzMERIT tests, Heritage was awarded a financial bonus. We are thankful for the students' diligent efforts in preparing for the test, for the teachers who helped them get ready and for the parental support and encouragement as the tests were administered.

We plan to utilize the funds in the following ways:

1. Investing in academic courses with additional textbooks, a laptop cart and lab equipment for science.
2. Reinvest in our arts programs with new lighting and microphones for auditorium and recording equipment for choir.
3. Supporting athletics with a redesign of the weight room.
4. Some of the funds will go toward a portion of the cost to build an additional shade structure in our lunch area.

Please congratulate your scholar on their performance on these tests!
